SEARCH
Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.pathwrappers

Interface PathWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTestDirectory, BasicPathWrapperImpl, RamDirectory, TempDirectory
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public interface PathWrapper
A path-like object that can provide a Java NIO Path.

Not only does this enable us to have different types of path with varying behaviour, but we can also use this to enforce that other references related to the internal path are kept alive for as long as the path-like object itself is kept alive.

This becomes very useful for RamDirectory, which keeps a RAM-based FileSystem alive until it is garbage collected, or the AbstractTestDirectory.close() operation is called. The mechanism enables cleaning up of resources implicitly without resource-tidying logic polluting the user's test cases.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes
